rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports testing plans using neutral language.
The segment reports planned testing, not realised impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports factual plans for testing without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes the department 'will test other flocks within a 10-kilometer (6-mile) zone'.
